Name: Swing Dunk
About the game: 'JUST SWING AND DUNK!' Swing Dunk delivers a stunning combination of fast-paced basketball and a stylish hoverboarding experience. Ride your hoverboard to slip through your opponentâ€™s defense and SWING the ball to shoot or throw down a SLAM DUNK. Train your skills and SWING your way to victory! Basketball like no one has ever experienced! It's not just point and shoot! Use the momentum from swinging the ball to shoot, pass, and DUNK! 3 vs 3 full-court / 1 vs 1 half-court available! Never get bored! Supports up to 8 players per game (4vs4), multiplayer Supports game controller / keyboard + mouse Your One and Only Character! Various characters, gloves, appearance, hoverboard, and effects Customize your very own character at the Locker Plenty of equipable visual effects to make your best play shine even more! Set perks to change your gameplay experience! Set your own perks to create unique moves! Choose the perfect perks and become the best teamplayer!
